column2: NEBRASKA DMV DRIVING TEST
Question Text
1. This road sign means:
column10: You may turn right after yielding the right-of-way to oncoming traffic

column2: 2. This road sign means:
3. If your wheels drop off the pavement edge, you should:
column4: turn back onto the roadway immediately.
column6: turn gradually back onto the roadway when safe.

column2: 4. At a four way stop, the driver who stops first should be permitted to go first.
5. A broken yellow center line:
column4: indicates that passing is permitted on the left when the way ahead is clear.
column6: indicates that passing is not permitted.
column8: separates two lanes traveling in the same direction.

column2: 6. When they see a yellow X signal, drivers should:
column4: come to a complete stop at the marked stop line.
column10: prepare to leave the lane safely.

column2: 7. This road sign means:
8. A four-way stop sign means:
column4: if two vehicles reach the intersection at the same time, the driver on the left yields to the driver on the right.
column6: traffic from all four directions must stop.
column8: there are four stop signs at this intersection.

column2: 9. It is illegal to:
column4: pass within 300 feet of a railroad crossing.
column6: pass within 300 feet of any intersection.
column8: pass in any marked no-passing zone.

column2: 10. An octagonal sign means that drivers must:
column8: come to a complete stop at the marked stop line.

column2: 11. At intersections with a yield sign, you must:
column4: yield to the vehicles on your left only.
column6: yield the right-of-way to cross traffic close enough to cause conflict.

column2: 12. The picture shows:
13. This road sign means:
column4: Slow down, stop if necessary and yield the right-of-way
column6: You must come to a complete stop

column2: 14. Your BAC depends on:
column8: how much time passes between drinks.

column2: 15. What should you do if your headlights suddenly go out?
column4: Brake immediately and activate your emergency lights.
column6: Use your emergency lights, parking lights or directional signals.
column8: Ease your foot off the gas pedal and brake gently.
column10: Ease your foot off the gas pedal and brake gently.

column2: 16. What does it mean If an oncoming driver flashes headlights at you during a period of low visibility?
column4: Your headlights are too bright. You should turn them off.
column6: Your vehicle was difficult to see. You should turn on your headlights.
column8: Your headlights are too bright. You should use parking lights instead.
column10: You are driving in the wrong direction. Make a U-turn as soon as possible.

column2: 17. If your brakes are wet, you can dry them by:
column4: pull over to the right and wait until it stops raining.
column6: having them checked by a mechanic.

column2: 18. When pedestrians are in a crosswalk, drivers should:
column4: go ahead because drivers have the right-of-way.
column8: pull over to the right and stop.

column2: 19. When taking medication while driving, you should:
column6: consult your physicians and/or pharmacist regarding any prescription medication and its possible effects on driving.
column8: drive 20 MPH below the posted speed limit.

column2: 20. Broken white lines:
column4: separate lanes of traffic going in the same direction.
column6: indicate you are in a no passing zone.
column8: can be crossed over at any time.

column2: 21. When you get in a car to drive, the first thing you should do is:
22. At intersections marked with stop lines, drivers must:
column8: slow down and enter the intersection.
column10: enter the intersection and then stop.

column2: 23. You are stopped at a stop sign and you are going to go straight through the intersection. A car on the cross road has stopped at a stop sign on your right and is going to go straight. Who has the right-of-way?
24. This sign means:
column4: A road crosses the main highway ahead.
column6: The divided highway on which drivers are traveling ends ahead.
column8: Drivers are coming to a point where another traffic lane joins the one they are on.

column2: 25. _____________ lights indicate that drivers should slow down and proceed with caution at an intersection.
